concept.title: Pods
concept.shortdesc: Pods are user interface widgets that users can customize.

conbody.p: Similar to the widgets in the Home section of each Application view, Pods are shortcuts to view information and perform actions within the application. Pods are not accessible, but because Pods act as containers of shortcuts, alternative accessible ways exist to reach the same information or perform the same actions. Pods can contain whatever artifact you want, for example, links to Search person pages or Case pages.
